remarks: The predicate "is a subspace" (of a left module or left vector space). (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lssset.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lssset.b $e |- B = ( Base ` F ) $.
lssset.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lssset.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lssset.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lssset.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
islss $p |- ( U e. S <-> ( U C_ V /\ U =/= (/) /\ A. x e. B A. a e. U A. b e. U ( ( x .x. a ) .+ b ) e. U ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d U a b x $.
$d W a b x $.
